abstract.t: This document describes an experimental TLS extension for in-band transport of the complete set of DNSSEC validatable records needed to perform DANE authentication of a TLS server without the need to perform separate out-of-band DNS lookups. When the requisite DNS records do not exist, the extension conveys a validatable denial of existence proof.
This experimental extension is developed outside the IETF and is published here to guide implementation of the extension and to ensure interoperability among implementations.
